Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Southbound Reroute near Pulaski/Adams
ShortDescription: Southbound 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via: Pulaski, Madison, Hamlin, Jackson, and Pulaski due to, street blockage near Pulaski/Adams.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via: Pulaski, Madison, Hamlin, Jackson, and Pulaski due to, street blockage near Pulaski/Adams.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Fullerton
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Fullerton due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Fullerton due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
